trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve recuperar <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações de propriedade quando receber ou exibir uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class is used primarily by the receiving queue manager when authenticating a message.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe é usada principalmente pelo Gerenciador de fila de recebimento durante a autenticação de uma mensagem.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property is set by Message Queuing and is used by the queue manager to verify who sent the message and that the sender has access rights to the receiving queue.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade é definida pelo enfileiramento de mensagens e é usada pelo Gerenciador de fila para verificar que enviou a mensagem e o remetente tem direitos de acesso para a fila de recebimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para receber <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve recuperar <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações de propriedade quando receber ou exibir uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the version of Message Queuing used to send the message.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe especifica a versão do serviço de enfileiramento de mensagens usado para enviar a mensagem.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property is important to be aware of when using features like transaction processing, which is only supported by Message Queuing version 2.0 and later, or digital signatures, which are used to authenticate messages sent by version 1.0.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade é importante estar ciente ao usar recursos, como processamento de transações, só há suporte para a versão 2.0 do enfileiramento de mensagens e assinaturas digitais ou posteriores, que são usadas para autenticar mensagens enviadas pela versão 1.0.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set by the sending queue manager when the message is sent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é definido pelo Gerenciador de fila de envio quando a mensagem é enviada.</xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para receber <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SenderVersion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SentTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve recuperar <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SentTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações de propriedade quando receber ou exibir uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SentTime%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class indicates the sending machine's date and time when the message was sent by the source Queue Manager.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SentTime%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe indica a data e hora quando a mensagem foi enviada pela fonte do Gerenciador de fila de envio da máquina.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.SentTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SentTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para receber <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SentTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies to retrieve all message properties when receiving a message.
trans-unit.target: Especifica para recuperar todas as propriedades de mensagem quando receber uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: Use SetAll to set all Boolean <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter> properties to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Use definir tudo para definir todas as Boolean <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>propriedades `true`.</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>

trans-unit.source: This causes all message properties to be retrieved when receiving messages.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que todas as propriedades de mensagem a ser recuperado ao receber mensagens.

trans-unit.source: SetAll does not affect the values for <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>, or <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Definir tudo não afeta os valores para <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>, <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>, ou <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>.</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>

trans-unit.source: After calling SetAll, you can set individual filter values to `false` in order to restrict the properties retrieved when the message is received.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar definir tudo, você pode definir valores de filtro individual `false` para restringir as propriedades recuperadas quando a mensagem for recebida.

trans-unit.source: Sets the filter values of common Message Queuing properties to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the integer-valued properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Define os valores de filtro de propriedades comuns de enfileiramento de mensagens para <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e as propriedades com valor de inteiro para seus valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: Use SetDefaults to set the following <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter> Boolean-valued properties to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Use SetDefaults para definir o seguinte <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>propriedades com valor booliano para `true`.</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>

trans-unit.source: These are the most common properties a <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue> will typically interact with the following: - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AcknowledgeType%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Acknowledgment%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AdministrationQueue%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Body%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Id%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Label%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.LookupId%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.MessageType%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.ResponseQueue%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A> - <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseJournalQueue%2A> SetDefaults sets the properties in the following table to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Essas são as propriedades mais comuns um <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>normalmente irá interagir com o seguinte:- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AcknowledgeType%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Acknowledgment%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AdministrationQueue%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Body%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Id%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Label%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.LookupId%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.MessageType%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.ResponseQueue%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A>- <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseJournalQueue%2A>SetDefaults define as propriedades na tabela a seguir para seus valores padrão.</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseJournalQueue%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.ResponseQueue%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.MessageType%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.LookupId%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Label%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Id%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Body%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AdministrationQueue%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.Acknowledgment%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.AcknowledgeType%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>|1024| |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>|255| |<xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>|255| The <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents a <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter> on which SetDefaults has been called.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor padrão | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>|&1024; | | <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A>|&255; | | <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A>|&255; | O <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade representa um <xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter>no qual SetDefaults tiver sido chamado.</xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.MessageReadPropertyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultLabelSize%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultExtensionSize%2A> </xref:System.Messaging.MessagePropertyFilter.DefaultBodySize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve recuperar <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações de propriedade quando receber ou exibir uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the computer where the message originated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe especifica o computador onde a mensagem se originou.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para receber <xref:System.Messaging.Message.SourceMachine%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve recuperar <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações de propriedade quando receber ou exibir uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies the total time in seconds for a sent message to be received from the destination queue.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe especifica o tempo total em segundos para uma mensagem enviada ser recebida da fila de destino.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A>

trans-unit.source: The time limit for the message to be retrieved from the target queue includes the time spent getting to the destination queue, plus the time spent waiting in the queue before the message is retrieved by an application.
trans-unit.target: O tempo limite para a mensagem a ser recuperada da fila de destino inclui o tempo gasto obtendo à fila de destino e o tempo gasto aguardando na fila antes da mensagem é recuperada por um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para receber <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToBeReceived%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve recuperar <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações de propriedade quando receber ou exibir uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies a time limit in seconds from the time the message is sent for it to reach the destination queue.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe especifica um limite de tempo em segundos desde a hora em que a mensagem é enviada para ele alcançar a fila de destino.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para receber <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TimeToReachQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve recuperar <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações de propriedade quando receber ou exibir uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class identifies the transaction that sent the message.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe identifica a transação que enviou a mensagem.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this property within a receiving application to verify that a message was sent as part of a specific transaction.
trans-unit.target: Use esta propriedade dentro de um aplicativo de recebimento para verificar se uma mensagem foi enviada como parte de uma transação específica.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para receber <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve recuperar <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações de propriedade quando receber ou exibir uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class identifies the transaction status queue on the source computer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe identifica a fila de status de transação no computador de origem.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property is used for sending acknowledgment messages back to the sending application.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade é usada para enviar mensagens de confirmação de volta para o aplicativo de envio.

trans-unit.source: The transaction status queue is used by connector applications when receiving transactional messages sent to a foreign queue.
trans-unit.target: A fila de status de transação é usada por aplicativos de conector durante o recebimento de mensagens transacionais enviadas para uma fila externa.

trans-unit.source: A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing.
trans-unit.target: Existe uma fila externa em um sistema de enfileiramento de mensagens diferente de enfileiramento de mensagens da Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application.
trans-unit.target: Enfileiramento de mensagens da Microsoft se comunica com essas filas por meio de um aplicativo conector.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para receber <xref:System.Messaging.Message.TransactionStatusQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve recuperar <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações de propriedade quando receber ou exibir uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies whether the message needs to be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe Especifica se a mensagem precisa ser autenticada.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to look at the properties of a message and determine whether a message failed authentication.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível examinar as propriedades de uma mensagem e determinar se uma mensagem de falha na autenticação.

trans-unit.source: Messages that fail authentication are discarded and are not delivered to the queue.
trans-unit.target: Mensagens de falham de autenticação são descartadas e não são entregues para a fila.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para receber <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseAuthentication%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve recuperar <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações de propriedade quando receber ou exibir uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies whether a copy of a message that could not be delivered should be sent to a dead-letter queue.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe Especifica se uma cópia de uma mensagem que não pôde ser entregue deve ser enviada a uma fila de mensagens mortas.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para receber <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseDeadLetterQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve recuperar <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações de propriedade quando receber ou exibir uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies whether to encrypt a message.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe Especifica se é necessário criptografar uma mensagem.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para receber <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseEncryption%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve recuperar <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações de propriedade quando receber ou exibir uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies whether a copy of the message should be kept in a machine journal on the originating computer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe Especifica se uma cópia da mensagem deve ser mantida em um diário de máquina no computador de origem.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para receber <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseJournalQueue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property information when receiving or peeking a message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve recuperar <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações de propriedade quando receber ou exibir uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A> property of the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class specifies whether to track the route of a message as it moves toward its destination queue.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Messaging.Message>classe Especifica se deve controlar a rota de uma mensagem à medida que se aproxima sua fila de destino.</xref:System.Messaging.Message> </xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `true`, each time the original message passes through a Message Queuing routing server, a Message Queuing-generated report message is sent to the system report queue.
trans-unit.target: Se `true`, cada vez que a mensagem original passa por um servidor de roteamento de enfileiramento de mensagens, uma mensagem de relatório gerado pelo serviço de enfileiramento de mensagens é enviada para a fila de relatórios do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Using tracing involves setting up Active Directory and specifying a report queue for the Message Queuing enterprise.
trans-unit.target: Usando rastreamento envolve a configuração do Active Directory e especificando uma fila de relatórios para a empresa de enfileiramento de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: These settings are configured by the administrator.
trans-unit.target: Essas configurações são definidas pelo administrador.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to receive <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A?displayProperty=fullName> information; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para receber <xref:System.Messaging.Message.UseTracing%2A?displayProperty=fullName> informações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
